International Conference on Atmospheric Environment, Extreme Weather, and Health

HKBU, November 13-15, 2025

Abstract submission
Thanks for attending AEH 2025, see you again next time!
About

This conference will address the major environmental challenges facing the world today, with a particular focus on air pollution and extreme weather mechanisms, and strategies to combat them. Global warming is increasing the frequency and intensity of extreme events, threatening ecosystems and public health. The conference will delve into the intersection of meteorology, environment, health, and urban science, integrating fields such as physics, chemistry, computer science, social sciences, and public health. By highlighting these interdisciplinary interactions, the conference aims to promote collaborative research and generate novel insights and methods.

Experts and scholars from around the globe will share their latest research findings and discuss response strategies and policy recommendations. This will advance the scientific community's understanding of environmental challenges and aid in formulating solutions. Additionally, the conference will serve as a platform for exchanging ideas, fostering international cooperation, and enhancing societal awareness and capacity to respond to extreme events.

Abstract submission

Keynote speakers

The speaker lineup is still being finalized.

Schedule

This event is in its early stages. Join us from November 13-15, 2025. Registration on the 13th.

Session 1
Causes and Prevention of Atmospheric Pollution Events
Session 2
Mechanisms and Attribution of Extreme Weather and Climate Events
Session 3
Compound Events of Extreme Weather and Atmospheric Pollution
Session 4
Climate-Chemistry Interactions and Future Projections
Session 5
Climate Change, Air Pollution, and Their Health Impacts
Session 6
Urban Meteorology, Environment, Health, and Urban Resilience

Venue

HKBU, 224 Waterloo Road
Kowloon Tong
Hong Kong

The conference will be held at Hong Kong Baptist University, Kowloon Tong, Hong Kong.

Click here to get directions to HKBU.

Conference Organizers

The conference is organized by the Department of Geography at Hong Kong Baptist University..

For any questions about the conference or opportunities, please contact Prof. Gao Meng (mmgao2@hkbu.edu.hk).

Link of Sponsors

AEH 2025 is made possible by these organizations and companies.
